title: Rab and His Friends and Other Papers
author: Brown, John

title: Rab and His Friends and Other Papers
author: Brown, John

title: Spare Hours
author: Brown, John
snippet: "The Baron of Smaylho'me rose with day,            He spurr'd his courser on,          Without stop or stay, down the rocky way,            That leads to Brotherstone;"

title: Rab and his friends and other dogs and men,
author: Brown, John
snippet: He spurr'd his courser on, Without stop or stay, down the rocky way, That leads to Brotherstone ; "
